title: Pimm's Cup
directions: Fill four 8- to 10-ounce glasses with ice cubes. Divide fruit among glasses. Pour 3 tablespoons Pimm's No. 1 Cup and 1/2 cup soda into each glass. Garnish with cucumber and mint.
ingredients: *A blend of gin, liqueurs, and fruit extracts; available at some liquor stores and specialty foods stores.
